Posts.EditableText: I've uploaded an updated Release Candidate to http://www.axeuk.com/quest/qnet35rc.zip . This fixes the bugs reported so far. It's also a good opportunity for you to test the new "Check for updates" feature.
Posts.HTML:
I've uploaded an updated Release Candidate to http://www.axeuk.com/quest/qnet35rc.zip .

This fixes the bugs reported so far. It's also a good opportunity for you to test the new "Check for updates" feature.
